divs: sighting detailsrona parking lot forget exact time anywhere from 1900 to 2100. noticed first 1 then 2 orbs coming from direction of mountains (ene\inland) maybe 1.5-3 km off. let's just say i like watching the sky. ride came, got in car. thought were planes at first, but no beacons\red+green directional lights. constant source w\ a little flickering from either pattern too far away to see or atmosphere. not chinese lanterns as going estimated 30-120 klicks* in wrong direction for wind (7-12km\h). but i digress. drove first n to lougheed hwy, then e along lougheed for some 700m as crow flies, then object cloaks almost directly overhead. seeing as about 750m-1.2km above, and cloud cover about 6000m above... also, first object had cloaked while i was behind some branches, almost in exact same spot. total time i observed was about 3-4 min. almost seemed like they were on patrol, almost lazily moving in generally straight path, then cloaking in same area. *based on degree of arc\unit of time, so 5-10��� in 3s and about 700m-1.2km** high. small plane stalls about 75km\h, so may or may not have been going right speed for plane... but no federally mandated lights!? **based on triangulated diam of last orb i saw, perhaps 4.1m across. these things follow me everywhere, even in photos i took in greece. say hi to ufo hunters for me and ask them why u no make more episodes. want to see analysis of non-fake dome of the rock ufo footage (hint: the fake one is where the woman from tennessee speaks).
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Maple Ridge
There were no other sightings in Maple Ridge on or around January 12th 2012
